text: 10:2 Matyu 9:37-38; Jon 4:35; 2 Tesalonika 3:1Egha a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Dagher bar avɨrim anigha gɨvagha azenimɨn iti. Ezɨ ingangarir gumazamizir da iniamin avɨriba puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia azenir kamɨn ghuavimɨn azangsɨghtɨ, a ingangarir gumazamizibar amangɨtɨ, me an azenimɨn mangɨ dagheba iniam.
